name: Offroad Extreme!
overview: Enter the super-charged turbo driven world of Off Road Extreme. This is where off road racing takes on a whole new meaning! From Karts to Baja Buggies, Offroad Extreme delivers a unique and exciting gamplay experience. You will race a variety of off road vehicles through visually stunning environments, around rugged terrain, along valleys and through ancient cave structures. Choose from a vast selection of detailed off road machines with an impressive 32 unique track variations including quarries, canyons and mines. Featuring realistic weather conditions during day and night. Earn prize money to unlock hidden extras, including upgrades, extra challenges, extra courses and much more. Utilising the Wii controls to allow you to use the wireless Wii Remote as a steering wheel. Be careful though, every time your vehicle takes some on damage you will have to pay for your repairs.
